article_title: IDF failures led to aid workers' deaths - Australia
sentence: An  Australian  government  review  has  found  that  "serious  failures"  by  the  Israeli  military  led  to  drone  strikes  on  an  aid  convoy  that  killed  seven  workers  in  Gaza.

article_title: IDF failures led to aid workers' deaths - Australia
sentence: The  strike  on  1  April  killed  charity  workers  from  the  World  Central  Kitchen  (WCK)  from  Australia,  Canada,  Poland,  the  UK  and  the  US,  as  well  as  their  Palestinian  colleague.

article_title: IDF failures led to aid workers' deaths - Australia
sentence: More  than  250  aid  workers  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  October  7,  2023,  according  to  the  United  Nations.
